ArcRaiderItems.Name: Metal Parts
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic material. Used in almost all crafting, especially for mechanical and protective gear.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Rubber Parts
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic material. Used for gear, medical items, and non-metal components.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Plastic Parts
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic material. Used for electronic casing, utility items, and general components.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Fabric
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic material. Used for cloth-based items, gear, and medical supplies.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Chemicals
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic liquid material. Used for explosives, consumables, and medical concoctions.
ArcRaiderItems.Usage: Base Material, Core Resource for Consumables

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Wires
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic electrical material. Used in all electronic and advanced component crafting.
ArcRaiderItems.Usage: Base Material, Core Resource for Electronics

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Oil
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Basic industrial fluid. Used to craft fuel and other chemical compounds.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Mechanical Components
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Refined mechanical material. Used for mid-tier weapons, mods, and upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Electrical Components
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Refined electronic material. Used for tactical tools and mid-tier upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Advanced Mechanical Components
ArcRaiderItems.Description: High-tier mechanical material. Used to craft advanced weapons and top-tier upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Advanced Electrical Components
ArcRaiderItems.Description: High-tier electronic material. Used for advanced gear and top-tier upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Durable Cloth
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Refined fabric. Used to craft protective gear and medical items.
ArcRaiderItems.Usage: Refined Material, Expedition Resource, Quest Item

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Crude Explosives
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Refined chemical material. Used to craft all ordnance.
ArcRaiderItems.Usage: Refined Material, Building Upgrade, Ordnance Crafting

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Antiseptic
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Used to craft medical supplies. Found in Medical areas.
ArcRaiderItems.Usage: Refined Material, Quest Item, Building Upgrade

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Sensors
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Used in complex electronics and stealth components.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Processor
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Used in advanced electronic upgrades and high-tier gear.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: ARC Alloy
ArcRaiderItems.Description: A base ARC material. Obtained from ARC enemies or by recycling certain ARC parts.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: ARC Powercell
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Valuable ARC drop. Used to craft energy-based items and high-tier upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: ARC Motion Core
ArcRaiderItems.Description: ARC drop. Used to craft components and gear, especially early shields.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: ARC Circuitry
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Refined ARC material. Used for high-tier upgrades and crafting.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Wasp Driver
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Wasp ARC machines. Quest/Upgrade item.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Hornet Driver
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Hornet ARC machines. Quest/Upgrade item.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Snitch Scanner
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Snitch ARC machines. Quest/Upgrade item.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Surveyor Vault
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Surveyor ARC machines. High-tier upgrade item.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Bastion Cell
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Bastion ARC machines. Used for high-tier upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Bombardier Cell
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Bombardier ARC machines. High-tier upgrade item.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Sentinel Firing Core
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Sentinel ARC machines. Used for upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Pop Trigger
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Pop ARC machines. Used for upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Tick Pod
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Tick ARC machines. Used for upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Leaper Pulse Unit
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Drops from Leaper ARC machines. High-tier item.

ArcRaiderItems.Description: Found in mechanical areas. Used for Gunsmith upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Rusted Tools
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Found in mechanical areas. Used for Gunsmith upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Description: Found in Medical locations. Used for upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Name: Rusted Shut Medical Kit
ArcRaiderItems.Description: Found in medical areas. Used for Medical Lab upgrades.

ArcRaiderItems.Description: Electronic component. Used for Expedition projects.

ArcRaiderItems.Description: Electronics found in Technological/Electrical areas.

ArcRaiderItems.Description: Used in provision crafting.
